channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache -- Apache XML-RPC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache -- Apache XML-RPC

item.title: CVE-2019-17570|2024-08-05T01:40:15.866Z -- apache -- apache%20xml-rpc
item.description: An untrusted deserialization was found in the org.apache.xmlrpc.parser.XmlRpcResponseParser:addResult method of Apache XML-RPC (aka ws-xmlrpc) library. A malicious XML-RPC server could target a XML-RPC client causing it to execute arbitrary code. Apache XML-RPC is no longer maintained and this issue will not be fixed.
